Class FESI.awtgui.AwtConsole 

FESI.awtgui.AwtConsole
public class AwtConsole
implements Console

AwtConsole(InterpreterCommands, String, int, int)
Create a new console interface - this is limited by the AWT usage of TextEdit.

clear()
Clear the console content
createEditor(String)
Create a new editing window for the specified file
displayAbout()
Display the about information
displayHelpText()
Display the
displayHelpWindow()
Display the help window
getConsoleIn()
Get the stream consisting of characters typed by the user
getConsoleOut()
Get the stream to which to print characters to be displayed on the console
supportsEditing()
Inform if editing is supported

AwtConsole 
 public AwtConsole(InterpreterCommands itrpParam,
                   String title,
                   int rows,
                   int columns)
Create a new console interface - this is limited by the AWT usage of TextEdit.

Parameters:
itrpParam - The interpreter which will receive the exit command whel EOF is received.
title - The window title string

getConsoleIn 
 public InputStream getConsoleIn()
Get the stream consisting of characters typed by the user

 public PrintStream getConsoleOut()
Get the stream to which to print characters to be displayed on the console

Clear the console content
